items.sentence: Tom doesn't eat any fish other than pickled herring.
I need to get back to Australia as soon as possible.
I was arrested three times while I was in Australia.
Let's hope that Tom didn't do what you think he did.
I hope that Tom enjoys singing as much as Mary does.
Do you know anyone who can teach my children French?
A beautiful woman was seated one row in front of me.
I think I paid about three hundred dollars for that.
It isn't likely that Tom will ever admit he's wrong.
Tom told me that he isn't certain what he should do.
Tom knows that he isn't supposed to do that anymore.
Tom is going to do that later when he isn't so busy.
Tom doesn't like being told he isn't old enough yet.
Tom doesn't know he isn't supposed to do that again.
Tom certainly sounds like he isn't planning to come.
Maybe Tom doesn't know he isn't supposed to do that.
I don't think Tom knows he isn't likely to be fired.
Could you call my teacher and pretend you're my dad?
Tom isn't studying geology. He's studying geography.
Would you believe me if I told you that I loved you?
I couldn't make myself heard in the noisy classroom.
Tom has been to Boston more times than he can count.
It may be easier to do that than you think it'll be.
Tom wasn't the last person to cross the finish line.
Tom will regret doing that for the rest of his life.
Tom fell asleep while reading the evening newspaper.
I leave home for the company at seven every morning.
I go by that shop every morning on my way to school.
I sat down in the shade of a tree and read the book.
I didn't want to be defeated in front of my friends.
I managed to finish preparing for tomorrow's lesson.
I stayed at the hotel, but the others went shopping.
I went into the town in search of a good restaurant.
I studied in the morning during the summer vacation.
I left home early so I'd be on time for the meeting.
I spent the major part of my vacation at my uncle's.
I want to live as long as I can stay in good health.
I can't keep up with the recent British music scene.
I studied hard so that I could pass the examination.
I gave the poor boy what little money I had with me.
I only hope the rain holds off for a few hours more.
I think we should get away from here for a few days.
I haven't been feeling like myself since last month.
I must apologize to you for not writing for so long.
I want you to have a definite plan before you leave.
I remember the night when I first saw the Milky Way.
I'll reimburse you for the damage I did to your car.
I'll go at three, or rather at a quarter past three.
Mary's husband was here a while ago looking for her.
Tom should be able to do that without anyone's help.
